image_requirements.description: All images must be in focus, professionally lit and photographed.
Clean styling and white backgrounds only for all required images (RGB 255, 255, 255; hex #FFFFFF). Non-white backgrounds are only permitted for 'Additional Alternate' lifestyle/editorial shots only.
Image of product/model should be centered in the frame.
Image must show the entire product and follow cropping standards.
Images should be cropped with a 5% buffer from the end of the product image to nearest vertical or horizontal border, depending on image perspective (tall vs wide).
Shadow: Light & Natural (remove for ghost images).
Do NOT enlarge small images to fill space or meet required pixel dimensions.

summary: The page outlines image requirements for apparel photography, emphasizing the need for focus, appropriate background, color fidelity, centering, and adherence to cropping standards. It also highlights prohibited imagery, such as excessive accessories and inappropriate content.
